318a6('bum): la ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas pa la nye bar gnas par byed do/ / la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan dang po la 'god do//
318a7('bum): la la ni bas ma ga tan gnyis pa la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan gsum pa la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do// la la ni byams pa la 'god do// la la ni snying rje la
318b1('bum): 'god do/ / la la ni dga' ba la 'god do// la la ni btang snyoms la 'god do// la la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do// la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la 'god

318b3('bum): chos rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni gtong ba rjes

319a2('bum): ba'i stobs bcu la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni byams pa chen po

319a4('bum): gnyis yongs su grub par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo/ / la la ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo// la la

319a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa'i bde ba
319b1('bum): dang ldan par 'god do/ / rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

319b3('bum): pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / ma nor bar bstan/
319b4('bum): pa ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
319b5('bum): gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang thun mong du gyur pa rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

319b7('bum): chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do// de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang / 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i chos
320a1('bum): shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
320a2('bum): yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams so// 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi
320a3('bum): 'bras bu ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
320a4('bum): dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// dgra bcom pa
320a5('bum): nyid shes pa'o/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes
320a6('bum): pa'o/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o//
320a7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid shes pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o// mtha'
320b1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
320b2('bum): shes pa'o/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// ngo za nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po med pa'i
320b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes pa'o// dbang po lnga shes pa'o// stobs
320b4('bum): lnga shes pa'o/ / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi shes pa'o// tshad
320b5('bum): med pa bzhi shes pa'o/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad shes pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes pa'o// rnam
320b6('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams shes pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes
320b7('bum): ba'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi shes pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes
321a1('bum): pa'o/ byams pa chen po shes pa'o// snying rje chen po shes pa'o// dga' ba chen po shes pa'o// btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa
321a2('bum): dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/ rnam
321a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
321a4('bum): 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i/
321a5('bum): chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
321a6('bum): chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
321a7('bum): po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur
321b1('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag yod do// gsol pa/ bye brag ji
321b2('bum): lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes
321b3('bum): brnyes pa zhes bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas shing chos thams cad la mun pa med pa 'thob pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
321b4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do/ / rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la brten pas/
321b5('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing / thabs
321b6('bum): mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no// / rab 'byor byang chub sems
321b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
322a1('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad/
322a2('bum): pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
322a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po
322a4('bum): brgyad cu dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te/ 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
322a5('bum): gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/ nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ ngan pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems
322a6('bum): dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do/ / lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba dang zad
322a7('bum): ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ / lus la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes
322b1('bum): su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun 'byung ba'i//
322b2('bum): rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing
322b3('bum): 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/ / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas
322b4('bum): 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spong do// sems la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par sbed
322b5('bum): do/ sems la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi chos dang / phyi'i ches
322b6('bum): dang phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par
322b7('bum): spyod do/ / chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//
323a1('bum): chos la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma
323a2('bum): skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /
323a3('bum): skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa skyes pa'o// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong
323a4('bum): ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i
323a5('bum): / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang
323a6('bum): po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o// stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs
323a7('bum): dang ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos
323b1('bum): rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu byang ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
323b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yang lag ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
323b3('bum): pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba
323b4('bum): dang yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
323b5('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid
323b6('bum): kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// smon
323b7('bum): pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// rnam par thar pa brgyar gang zhe na/ gzugs
324a1('bum): can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ / nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam
324a2('bum): par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ / bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// rnam shes
324a3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ / cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bslabs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// 'du shes med
324a4('bum): 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de
324a5('bum): dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la la 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang
324a6('bum): bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar
324a7('bum): zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs/
324b1('bum): te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyi sa de la dran pa dang
324b2('bum): ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes pa rjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs
324b3('bum): shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te
324b4('bum): gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam
324b5('bum): mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
324b6('bum): rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung
324b7('bum): zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med//
325a1('bum): min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tsher rab
325a2('bum): 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o// de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ mtha' dag sa dang / mtha' dag
325a3('bum): chu dang / mtha' dag me dang / mtha' dag rlung dang / mtha' dag sngon po dang / mtha' dag ser po dang / mtha' dag dmar po dang / mtha' dag dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par shes
325a4('bum): ba dang / mtha' dag nam mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o// de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / phyi rol
325a5('bum): gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil
325a6('bum): gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o/ / nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil
325a7('bum): gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs
325b1('bum): phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon/
325b2('bum): paba'i skye mched gsum pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil
325b3('bum): gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon
325b4('bum): bo kha dog sngon po/ sngon por snang ba/ mdog sngon po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na me tog oM ma ka lta bu 'am/ yul wA rA NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba/ kha dog sngo ba/ sngo bar snang
325b5('bum): ba mdog sngo bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o// nang gzugs
325b6('bum): med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser por snang ba/ mdog ser po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na shing kar shi ka ra'i me tog lta bu 'am/ yul wA rA NA/
325b7('bum): sir byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba/ kha dog ser ba/ ser bar snang ba/ mdog ser bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de
326a1('bum): ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/ / nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar
326a2('bum): por snang ba/ mdog dmar po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na ban du dza ba ka'i me tog lta bu 'am/ yul wA rA NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar dmar ba/ kha dog dmar ba/ dmar bar snang ba/ mdog
326a3('bum): dmar bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o// nang gzugs
326a4('bum): med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ dkar por snang ba/ mdog dkar po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skar ma pa wa sangs kyi 'od lta bu 'am/ yul
326a5('bum): wA rA NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar dkar ba/ kha dog dkar ba/ dkar bar snang ba/ mdog dkar bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyi sa ma nan te mthob
326a6('bum): zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o/ / de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
326a7('bum): po'i rnam par spyod pa/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i mthu yod pa/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o// smon
326b1('bum): / lam gyi shes pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te/ 'di shes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes pa 'am/ shes pa gang dang gang 'dod par
326b2('bum): gyur pa de la yid kyi smon pa byed de/ de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ de'i smon lam yongs su grub par gyur cing / shes bya de'ang shes pa de ni smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o// de la
326b3('bum): mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon
326b4('bum): par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/ drug po de dag go// de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/
326b5('bum): lus yongs su dag pa dang / dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang
326b6('bum): pa dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang
326b7('bum): ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag go/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni
327a1('bum): gnas la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ / gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'das pa dang //
327a2('bum): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// khams sna
327a3('bum): tshogs can dang / khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs pa dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji
327a4('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ / sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji
327a5('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun
327a6('bum): nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs
327a7('bum): pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya phrag stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar du'ang rjes su dgongs so// bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgod
327b1('bum): pa nas/ bskal pa brgya'i bar dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar dag kyang
327b2('bum): rjes su dgongs te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go// ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// zas ni 'di za za'o//
327b3('bum): yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so// tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba ras/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes
327b4('bum): so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ sa mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so// lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas
327b5('bum): sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dag kyang gzigs so/ / kha dog sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta
327b6('bum): ba bzhin du nye bar 'dong ba'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa
327b7('bum): dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o// sems can 'di
328a1('bum): dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa mi
328a2('bum): 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to// zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems
328a3('bum): rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba zag pa med pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so// rab 'byor de bzhin
328a4('bum): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag
328a5('bum): la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang
328a6('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog
328a7('bum): rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' 'o/ / 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/
328b1('bum): / gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ tshes dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad//
328b2('bum): par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol
328b3('bum): bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa
328b4('bum): thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' 'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha
328b5('bum): 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su
328b6('bum): bstan pa de dag la bsten na/ bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig
328b7('bum): rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med
329a1('bum): pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par sprod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' 'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs
329a2('bum): pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu
329a3('bum): bskor bar bya'o/ / gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la/ nan tan byas na sdug
329a4('bum): bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten na
329a5('bum): chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob
329a6('bum): pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod da/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' 'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na/
329a7('bum): dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ste/
329b1('bum): bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
329b2('bum): nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la
329b3('bum): dmigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de
329b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med
329b5('bum): pa dang po'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes
329b6('bum): gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin
329b7('bum): gshegs pa la thugs kyi spod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa
330a1('bum): gsum pa'o/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/ 'di la rna ba btud de rim gror
330a2('bum): nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na'ang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/ yid bde bar mi 'gyur/ zug
330a3('bum): yeyang yeng por mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o// la la rna ba btudad de'i ma gror mi nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med pa dang / chos dang gnyer
330a4('bum): ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed na'ang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar mi 'gyur/ mi bzod par mi 'gyur/ thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag/
330a5('bum): pa gnyis pa'o// la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/ la la rna ba btud de rim gror mi nyan
330a6('bum): cing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa'am/ thugs khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur
330a7('bum): te/ thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ga
330b1('bum): zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi 'da' ba ste/ de ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces
330b2('bum): bya'o/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/
330b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu'ang mi mnga' ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
330b4('bum): thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir/ dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa
330b5('bum): mdzad ces bya ste/ dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/ de ni thugs
330b6('bum): rje chen po zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga' 'o// ca co mi mnga' 'o//
330b7('bum): dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga' 'o// thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga' 'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga' 'o// mos pa yongs su
331a1('bum): nyams pa mi mnga'a'o/ / brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'a'o// dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'
331a2('bum): 'o/ shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// sku'i
331a3('bum): 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs
331a4('bum): kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ ma 'ongs pa'i
331a5('bum): dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
331a6('bum): ba rnams so/ / rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmigs pa med pa/ dran pas dbang sgyur ba/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan
331a7('bum): nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan
331b1('bum): / pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs/
331b2('bum): pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang / ri dgas e n+ya ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang /
331b3('bum): gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / s+phu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng
331b4('bum): ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa
331b5('bum): dang ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / tshems shin tu mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang
331b6('bum): pa dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan dkar gnag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong
331b7('bum): dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'di lta ste/ rus pa 'am/ ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas/ phyag dang zhabs
332a1('bum): 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o/ / zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing / zhabs zhum pa med pas/ nabs shin tu gnas pa'o// ngang pa'i
332a2('bum): rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel bas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o// shing bal gyi le'u ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam
332a3('bum): pa'o/ / phyag dang / zhabs dang / mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho bas/ bdun shin tu mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas/ sor mo ring ba'o// rting pa ring bas/ rting pa yangs pa'o//
332a4('bum): sku lag pa bdun du 'phags la drang bas/ sku che zhing drang ba'o// pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas/ zhabs legs par mtho ba'o// spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil
332a5('bum): bas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o/ / ri dgas e n+ya ya'i byin pa dang / smig ma dang / ldum bu dar pa ltar drang zhing ma nyams la rim gyis gzhol bar grub cing byin pa zlum pas/
332a6('bum): ri dgas e n+ya ya'i byin pa lta bu'o// brla drang por bzhag ste/ ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas/ phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o// glang po dang rta cang
332a7('bum): shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/ gsang ba'i gnas slabs su nub pa'o// shin tu spangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas/ ga ser gyi kha dog go/
332b1('bum): gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'dug la/ sku la rdul mi 'go bas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o// shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sku re rer skyes shing gnyis
332b2('bum): med pas/ sU re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'o// me tog kun da dang / zla ba dang / 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la/ nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od
332b3('bum): gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas/ zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o// ro stod che bas/ seng ge'i ro stod do// mgur dang rgyang legs par 'brel cing la
332b4('bum): ba sa phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o/ / gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas/ phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o// rlung dang / mkhris pa
332b5('bum): bad kan gyis ma nyams shing / rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go// sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pa sa/ shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa'o// spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs/
332b6('bum): lagayas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas/ dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// me tog ut+pal dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog
332b7('bum): ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas/ ljag sa shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o// tshangs pa dang / bya ka la bing ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram pa me long gi
333a1('bum): dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing / mdzes par skyes te/ yid du 'ong bas/ seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o// me tog kun da dang / dung gi bcag 'gro
333a2('bum): ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas/ tshems shin tu dkar ba'o// tshems la mtho dman med pas/ tshems mnyam pa'o// tshems la mtshams ma dod pas/ tshems thags
333a3('bum): bzang ba'o/ / bla 'og tu gyi gu med pas/ tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o// dkar gnag gi cha ma 'dres la/ shin tu rnam par dag cing / mdog dmar pos ma g.yogs pas/
333a4('bum): spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o// rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas/ ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o// de la bla ma'i bsu bskyal dang / chos mnyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug
333a5('bum): lag khang dang / mchod rten rjes su bsgrubs pa la sogs pa la phu dud du byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa skye ba ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so//
333a6('bum): yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ de ni mi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas so// sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam bzhi
333a7('bum): goms par byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba ste/ de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas so// bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas/ phyag
333b1('bum): dang nabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba 'thob pa'i snga ltas so// bcings pa
333b2('bum): ba dang / srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas/ sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// dge ba'i chos
333b3('bum): yang dag par blangs pa dang / bzung ba mngon par spel cing / 'grib par ma byas pas/ zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste/ de ni mi nyams pa'i chos ra
333b4('bum): ldan pa'i snga ltas so/ / rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing / gzhan la byin pa dang / bdag gis blangs pas/ ri dgas e n+ya ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga
333b5('bum): ltas so/ / bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslang na mi 'gong bar gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas/ phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste/ de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang / dul ba'i snga lngas so//
333b6('bum): 'phrog pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / gnyen pa ma phye ba dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsdu
333b7('bum): bas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so// stan dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po byin pa sa/ gsar gyi
334a1('bum): kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni gdan dang / na bza' dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po 'thob pa'i snga ltas so//
334a2('bum): 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / phu nu la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gro byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / bcol ba rna la ma
334a3('bum): gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so// mi snyan par mi zer zhing mi smod la/ snyan par smra zhing legs par
334a4('bum): bshad par 'thun par 'dzin pas/ seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhan mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so// na ba rnams la rtsi dang / rim gro dang / sman dang /
334a5('bum): nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so// skyed mos tshal dang / 'khor dang / btung ba
334a6('bum): dang rdzing bu dang / brgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang / 'phrang ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang / gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing
334a7('bum): bdag gis gzhan byin pas/ shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang /
334b1('bum): nyams su bde bar smras pas/ ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// gsung yan lag lnga
334b2('bum): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / btang mi phra zhing rnar
334b3('bum): snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o// yun ring po nas tshig bkyil ba spangs shing / dus su smra smra bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so//
334b4('bum): rim gror bya ba dang / brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas/ tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so// yun ring po
334b5('bum): nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig sgra smra bas/ tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so// pang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du/
334b6('bum): nyes par bsams pa med la/ ma chags shing mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas/ spyan dkar gnag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de ni kun nas mdzes
334b7('bum): pa'i snga ltas so/ / rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste
335a1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
335a2('bum): rnams ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthor
335a3('bum): por byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul la kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin
335a4('bum): tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
335a5('bum): thugs dang / gsung dang / sku'i 'phrin las dang / 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/ rtsa mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grel pa ste/
335a6('bum): la mdud pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams
335a7('bum): cad la sgrol ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
335b1('bum): mi'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas
335b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyu mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa
335b3('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar
335b4('bum): bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ sku shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnam
335b5('bum): shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
335b6('bum): ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu
335b7('bum): 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
336a1('bum): chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/ sku tshe
336a2('bum): zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
336a3('bum): rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ sku shin tu gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku zhum pa med pa yin/ sangs
336a4('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku
336a5('bum): shin tu mkhregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang nying lag sba bar mdzes pa
336a6('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan
336a7('bum): pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs
336b1('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnam par zlog pa ste/ phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin//
336b2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba
336b3('bum): g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
336b4('bum): thugs shin tu gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ kun spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/
336b5('bum): sku la sme ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar yang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
336b6('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang / skye bo phal la byams pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab cing brtan par//
336b7('bum): bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
337a1('bum): ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/ zhal ha cang mi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad
337a2('bum): du bkye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du gtang zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs
337a3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo'i 'dod chags pa rnams kyis/
337a4('bum): chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba ste/ glang
337a5('bum): po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang
337a6('bum): nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
337a7('bum): 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin
337b1('bum): tu dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ tshems mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis
337b2('bum): mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshe mas mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par
337b3('bum): mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas
337b4('bum): kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs
337b5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / skyes bu dang /
337b6('bum): na chung mchog mig dkar gnag 'byes shing / pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ste/ spyan dkar gnag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs
337b7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ smin ma 'jam
338a1('bum): pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ smin ma'i sku mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
338a2('bum): rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang
338a3('bum): ldan pa mnga' ba ste/ snyan legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
338a4('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su
338a5('bum): khyang ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyi rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs
338a6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/ dbu bung
338a7('bum): pa ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dag bsgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu skra stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
338b1('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pa sa bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/
338b2('bum): dbu ma 'dzings pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/ dbu mi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag
338b3('bum): spos kyi me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/ da bu dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra shis dang / dga' ba 'khyil bas
338b4('bum): brgyan pa yin te/ rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o// rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de
338b5('bum): dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa de ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
338b6('bum): chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos
338b7('bum): so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya brgyad cu ga// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
339a1('bum): chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams
339a2('bum): sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
339a3('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdung
339a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par
339a5('bum): smra bas sems can rnams sdud do/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
339a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams
339a7('bum): cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
339b1('bum): chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don mthun pas sems can rnams
339b2('bum): sdud do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
339b3('bum): don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do/ / rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor gzhan yang
339b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad du 'dems shing 'di skad du ston
339b5('bum): to/ rigs kyi bu khyed tshur shog/ yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la
339b6('bum): mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge bzhi
339b7('bum): bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge
340a1('bum): gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces ston to/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
340a2('bum): kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgom pa la mkhas pa yin
340a3('bum): te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na/ la la goms shing yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs
340a4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ de chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas/ yi ge mang pos yi ge med
340a5('bum): pa'i chos ston kyang / rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba'ang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i
340a6('bum): chos te/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
340a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin tu mi dmigs/ chos kyang mi dmigs/ chos kyi dngos
340b1('bum): po'ang mi dmigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
340b2('bum): dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
340b3('bum): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong
340b4('bum): pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
340b5('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
340b6('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas/
340b7('bum): sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/ de la ni sems can mi dmigs te/ sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ gzugs dmigs
341a1('bum): su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'du shes dmigs su ma mchis so// sems

341a4('bum): su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ lus dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ yid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas// gzugs

341b2('bum): shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su
341b3('bum): ma mchis so/ / sems can ma dmigs pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pa sa/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can

341b5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rna
341b6('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi
341b7('bum): dmigs pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// /
342a1('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sa'i khams dmigs su ma
342a2('bum): mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ chu'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ me'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs
342a3('bum): pas rlung gi khams dmigs su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pa sa/ nam mkha'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pa sa/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
342a4('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ ma rig pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'du byed dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs
342a5('bum): pas rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ ming dang gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ skye mched drug dmigs su
342a6('bum): su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sred
342a7('bum): pa dmigs su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ len pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ srid pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi
342b1('bum): dmigs pas/ skye ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rga shi dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs
342b2('bum): su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma
342b3('bum): mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs/
342b4('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis
342b5('bum): so/ sems can mi dmigs pas/ phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs
342b6('bum): pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ don
342b7('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'dus ma byas stong
343a1('bum): pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ thog

343a3('bum): pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid spong pa nyid
343a4('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs
343a5('bum): su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs
343a6('bum): su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ yang dag par spong ba dmigs su ma mchis so// /
343a7('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ dbang po lnga ramigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/
343b1('bum): stobs lnga dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'phags pa'i lam
343b2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su ma mchis so/ / sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ bsam gtan

346a3('bum): mchis so/ / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
346a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga las mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
346a5('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa bzhin no// rab 'byor de ltar sems can mi dmigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid
346a6('bum): du rig par bya'o/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// chen po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'dus byas stong

346b7('bum): par bya'o/ / tshor bar byed pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// shes pa po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid du rig par

347a2('bum): du rig par bya'o/ / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//

347a4('bum): du rig par bya'o/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid

347b4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/ ji ltar stong
347b5('bum): pa nyid de dag la'ang mi 'jug pa de ltar ston to/ / des de ltar mthong nas/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te/ chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed/ gnyis su mi byed do// yang
347b6('bum): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du'ang ston par byed do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni/ sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul zhing / sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/
347b7('bum): ba la sbyor/ la la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ ya la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol
348a1('bum): tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan bzhi la sbyor/ la la tshad med pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la gzugs med pa'i snyom
348a2('bum): pabapar 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyor/ la la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la dbang po lnga la sbyor/
348a3('bum): la la stobs lnga la sbyor/ la la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyor/ la la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor/ la la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la rnam par
348a4('bum): thar pa brgyad la sbyor/ la la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyor/ la la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sbyor/
348a5('bum): la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/ la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sbyor/ la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/ la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyor/ la la mi
348a6('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyor/ l-i la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la byams pa chen po la sbyor/ la la snying rje chen po la sbyor/ la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
348a7('bum): brgyad la sbyor/ la la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la dgra bcom pa nyid
348b1('bum): la sbyor/ la la rang byang chub la sbyor/ la la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la sbyor/ la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sbyor na// rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/
348b2('bum): sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
348b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas/ ma
348b4('bum): bcing sa ma grol ba'i tshul du yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba ma bcings ma grol

348b7('bum): ma bcing sa ma grol ba/ ro ma bcings ma grol ba/ reg ma bcing sa ma grol ba/ chos ma bcing sa ma grol ba/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ma bcing sa ma grol ba/ rna ba'i rnam
349a1('bum): par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma
349a2('bum): bcings ma grol ba/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna'i 'dus te reg

349a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol
349a6('bum): ba sa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ chu'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ me'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rlung gi kham sa ma bcings ma grol ba/ nam mkha'i khams ma bcing
349a7('bum): ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ ma rig pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ ming dang
349b1('bum): gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ skye mched drug ma bcings ma grol ba/ reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sred pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ len pa ma ba cing
349b2('bum): ma grol ba/ srid pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ skye ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ rga shi ma bcings ma grol ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
349b3('bum): pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcing sa ma grol ba/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma
349b4('bum): grol ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ spong
349b5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid ma bcing sa ma grol ba/ chen po stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'dus
349b6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
349b7('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ mi
350a1('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo/
350a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma bcings ma
350a3('bum): grol ba/ dbang po rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ stobs rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma
350a4('bum): bcings ma grol ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ bsam gtan rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshad med pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ gzugs med pa'i
350a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par thar
350a6('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ gzung
350a7('bum): kyi sgo rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma bcings ma grol ba/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ma bcings ma grol ba/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma bcings ma grol ba
350b1('bum): byams pa chen po ma bcings ma gol ba/ snying rje chen po ma bcings ma grol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma bcings ma grol ba/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol
350b2('bum): ba lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma bcings ma grol ba/ dgra bcom pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rang byang chub ma bcings ma grol ba/
350b3('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba ste// gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ gzugs
350b4('bum): ma yin no/ / tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ tshor ba ma yin no// 'du shes kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ 'du shes ma yin no// 'du byed kyi ma bcings ma
350b5('bum): grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ 'du byed ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// mig gi ma bcing sa ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/
350b6('bum): mig ma yin no// rna ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rna ba ma yin no// sna'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ sna ma yin no// lce'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa
350b7('bum): lce ma yin no/ / lus kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ lus ma yin no// yid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ yid ma yin no// gzugs kyi ma bcings
351a1('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ gzugs ma yin no// sgra'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ bla ma yin no// dri'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/

351a4('bum): nyid gang yin pa de/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma

351a7('bum): reg pa ma yin no/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/
351b1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang

351b3('bum): gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang

352a1('bum): grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ chu'i khams ma yin no// me'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ me'i khams ma yin no// rlung gi khams kyi ma
352a2('bum): bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rlung gi khams ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ nam mkha'i khams ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i

352b1('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de/ skye ba ma yin no// rga shi'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rga shi ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ sbyin pa'i

353a1('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ 'dus byas

353a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// dngos po med

353b1('bum): yin no/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma bcings

353b4('bum): yin no/ / stobs rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ stobs rnams ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ byang chub kyi yan
353b5('bum): lag rnams ma yin no/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi

354a1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no/ / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rnam par tha ra pa brgyad ma yin no// mthar gyis
354a2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
354a3('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa
354a4('bum): rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no//

354a7('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no// byams pa chen po'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ byams pa chen po ma yin no// snying rje chen po'i
354b1('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ snying rje chen po ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres

354b3('bum): ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no//

354b6('bum): yin pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshor ba ni shin tu rnam
354b7('bum): bapar dag pa'o/ / 'du shes ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'du byed ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mig ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rna
355a1('bum): ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ / sna ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lce ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lus ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yid ni shin tu rnam par

355a5('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni

355b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor

356a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ / nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni shin tu
356a2('bum): rnam par dag pa'o/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'dus byas stong /
