356a4('bum): nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par
356a5('bum): dag pa'o/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//
356a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// yang
356a7('bum): dag par spong ba rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// dbang po lnga ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// stobs lnga ni shin tu rnam par dag
356b1('bum): pa'o/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag
356b2('bum): pa'o/ / bsam gtan rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// tshad med pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//
356b3('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
356b4('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni
356b5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni shin/
356b6('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'o// byams pa chen po ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// snying rje chen po ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni shin tu rnam par dag
356b7('bum): pa'o/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//
357a1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rang byang chub ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// rnam pa thams
357a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ / rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnam
357a3('bum): la chos ston kyang / sems can du mi dmigs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa la/ de mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/
357a4('bum): gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
357a5('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce stong
357a6('bum): pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sgra stong pa nyid mi gnas
357a7('bum): pa'i tshul dang / dri stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ro stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / reg stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chos stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /
357b1('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam
357b2('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus
357b3('bum): te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa
357b4('bum): stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
357b5('bum): gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas
357b6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi
357b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams
358a1('bum): stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes
358a2('bum): pa'i khams stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
358a3('bum): tshul dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / reg pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid mi
358a4('bum): gnas pa'i tshul dang / sred pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / len pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / srid pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / skye ba stong pa nyid mi gnas
358a5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / rga shi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul
358a6('bum): dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid
358a7('bum): mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa
358b1('bum): nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas
358b2('bum): stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi
358b3('bum): gnas pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rang gi
358b4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
358b5('bum): tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul
358b6('bum): dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / dbang po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / stobs stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa
358b7('bum): nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan stong pa
359a1('bum): nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / tshad med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar
359a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
359a3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
359a4('bum): tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid mi gnas/
359a5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i
359a6('bum): tshul dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid mi
359a7('bum): gnas pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul
359b1('bum): dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la ni gang yang gnas pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
359b2('bum): 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te/ dngos po med pa la dngos po med pa mi gnas so// rang bzhin la rang bzhin mi gnas so// gzhan gyi dngos po la
359b3('bum): gzhan gyi dngos po mi gnas so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmigs su med de/ gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la'ang mi gnas so// rab 'byor de ltar na byang
359b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad ni stong pa nyid thams cad kyis rab tu 'byed de/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
359b5('bum): tu phyin pa la de ltar spod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rang sangs
359b6('bum): rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams dang / 'phags pa thams cad kyi skyon du mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems
359b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag dang / nyan thos de dag gis kyang / chos nyid de rjes su rtogs te/ chos nyid de rjes su rtogs pas kyang / sems
360a1('bum): can rnams la chos ston te/ de'ang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'da' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba med do// de bzhin nyid dang
360a2('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' ni 'da' ba med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin med do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya
360a3('bum): pa bam po nyis brgya gya gcig pa/ / // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos kyi dbyings la'ang
360a4('bum): 'da' ba ma mchis/ de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la'ang 'da' ba ma mchis na ci lags/ 'o na gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag
360a5('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'du shes kyang
360a6('bum): gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid
360a7('bum): kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
360b1('bum): zhig lags sam/ mig kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi
360b2('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sna'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
360b3('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lce'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/
360b4('bum): lus kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ yid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
360b5('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
360b6('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sgra'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ dri'ang gzhan la/ chos
360b7('bum): kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ ro'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
361a1('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ reg kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan/
361a2('bum): zhig lags sam/ chos kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang
361a3('bum): gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
361a4('bum): gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
361a5('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags
361a6('bum): sam lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang
361a7('bum): gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
361b1('bum): gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
361b2('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
361b3('bum): lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
361b4('bum): ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbying
361b5('bum): kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gnan/ de
361b6('bum): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang
361b7('bum): gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag
362a1('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gnan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag
362a2('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig
362a3('bum): lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sa'i
362a4('bum): khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ chu'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
362a5('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ me'i khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
362a6('bum): gzhan zhig lags sam/ rlung gi khams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams
362a7('bum): kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khaMs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang
362b1('bum): gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ ma rig pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
362b2('bum): mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ 'du byed kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rnam par shes
362b3('bum): pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags bag ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
362b4('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ skye mched drug kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
362b5('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ reg pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshor ba'ang gzhan la/
362b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sred pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan// de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/
362b7('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ len pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/
363a1('bum): srid pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ skye ba'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
363a2('bum): kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ rga shi'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
363a3('bum): yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshul khrims
363a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ chos
363a5('bum): kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin
363a6('bum): nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i

370a3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ya/
370a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid
370a5('bum): kyang gnan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gan
370a6('bum): ba ma yin no/ / nga bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
370a7('bum): kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
370b1('bum): kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan//
370b2('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma yin no/

376b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos

376b6('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang
376b7('bum): gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas
377a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par thar
377a2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mngon
377a3('bum): par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi
377a4('bum): dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
377a5('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa
377a6('bum): ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'ang
377a7('bum): gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ byams pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid
377b1('bum): kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ snying rje chen po'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma
377b2('bum): lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ bcom
377b3('bum): ldan 'das gal te de ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lan cig
377b4('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la
377b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid
377b6('bum): kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rang byang chub kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma
377b7('bum): lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
378a1('bum): nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags na/ 'o na ji ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par
378a2('bum): dgod cing / nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten/ dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar
378a3('bum): bopo ni lha dang mi/ dkar gnag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar gnag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong ba/ mi gnag cing mi dkar ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mi gnag
378a4('bum): cing mi dkar ba ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang
378a5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas te/ 'bras
378a6('bum): bu rnam par dgod pa bstan gyi/ don dam pa'i bden pas ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de ni rnam par brtag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa/ pha
378a7('bum): skad med pa ste/ 'di ltar ming bden pa dang / gzugs bden pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ste/ 'di ni mtha'
378b1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/ 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lags
378b2('bum): kyi don dam pa'i bden par ma lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang
378b3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci byis pa so so'i skye bo
378b4('bum): rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'am/ don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/ gal te shes na ni de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong
378b5('bum): ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par dgod par 'gyur na/ rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la/
378b6('bum): lam yang med/ lam rnam par dgod pa'ang med/ lam bsgom pa'ang med pas byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lta ga las 'ong / rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag
378b7('bum): rnams la ni lam yang yod/ lam bsgom pa'ang yod pas na/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags
379a1('bum): lam bsgom pas 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu 'thob par bgyi ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ lam bsgom
379a2('bum): bas 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu 'thob par bya ba med do// rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu 'thob pa med de/ lam gyis 'bras bu 'thob par bya ba'ang med do// lam
379a3('bum): la ma gnas par yang 'bras bu 'thob par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems
379a4('bum): can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod par byed de/ 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su gcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa mi byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
379a5('bum): 'das gal te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su gcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang
379a6('bum): pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems bsrabs pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// 'og ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir/
379a7('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do// gang ci'ang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i cha can du shes pas
379b1('bum): rang byang chub bo/ / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das ris su gcad cing 'dus
379b2('bum): byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis na/ gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
379b3('bum): 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par
379b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// bco
379b5('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su gcad pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
379b6('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid
379b7('bum): gcig tu chub par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'dus byas she 'am/ 'dus ma byas shes chos gang la'ang ris su gcod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom
380a1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta
380a2('bum): ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
380a3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
380a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can
380a5('bum): rnams la ris su gcad pas chos mi ston to/ / de bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
380a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan dang po 'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/ bsam gtan gsum pa'am/
380a7('bum): bsam gtan bzhi pa'am/ byams pa 'am/ snying rje 'am/ dga' ba 'am/ btang snyoms sam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas
380b1('bum): skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ dran pa nye bar
380b2('bum): gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i
380b3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam
380b4('bum): par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa
380b5('bum): rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/
380b6('bum): byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
380b7('bum): nyid do/ / chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do// de la mngon par zhen pa med pas/ gang la'ang chags pa med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yod
381a1('bum): su gtong yang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i
381a2('bum): don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / / tshul khrims srung yang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams
381a3('bum): cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du tshul khrims srung ngo / / bzod pa sgom yang bzod pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med/ bzod pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na
381a4('bum): sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du bzod pa sgom mo/ / brtson 'grus rtsom yang brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu nyams su
381a5('bum): myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug kyang / bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu la
381a6('bum): chags pa med/ bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go// shes rab
381a7('bum): sgom yang shes rab kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ shes rab kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du shes rab sgom
381b1('bum): mo zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom yang zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med
381b2('bum): pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo// 'jig
381b3('bum): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams sgom yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das/
381b4('bum): pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams sgom
381b5('bum): mo 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom yang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras
381b6('bum): bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams yongs su sgom mo// rab 'byor de
381b7('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
382a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad la spyod de/ chos gang la'ang gnas pa'am/
382a2('bum): chags pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid shin tu khong du chud do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ mtshan dang dpe byad
382a3('bum): bzang po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu bzhi'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya gya
382a4('bum): gnyis pa/ / // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
382a5('bum): chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sprul pa ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la yongs
382a6('bum): su spyod pa med do/ / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med
382a7('bum): paba'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do// tshor ba la yongs
382b1('bum): su spyod pa med do/ / 'du shes la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'du byed la yongs su spyod pa med do// rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// mig la yongs su spyod pa med do//

382b6('bum): su spyod pa med do/ / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// lus kyi
382b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// rna
383a1('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyong pa med do// lce'i 'dus te/
383a2('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su
383a3('bum): spyod pa med do/ / sa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do// chu'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do// me'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do// rlung gi khams la yongs su spong pa

383a5('bum): rig pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ / 'du byed la yongs su spyod pa med do// rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// ming dang gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do// skye
383a6('bum): mched drug la yongs su spyod pa med do/ / reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// sred pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// lon pa la yongs su spyod
383a7('bum): pa med do/ / srid pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// skye ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// rga shi la yongs su spyod pa med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// tshul
383b1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// bsam
383b2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// phyi stong pa nyid la yongs
383b3('bum): su spyod pa med do/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// chen po stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// don dam pa stong
383b4('bum): pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la

383b6('bum): spyod pa med do/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa
383b7('bum): med do/ / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do//
384a1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med
384a2('bum): do/ dbang po rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// stobs rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
384a3('bum): pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// bsam gtan rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// tshad med pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med
384a4('bum): do/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// rnam par thar pa brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la
384a5('bum): yongs su spyod pa med do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//
384a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la yongs su spyod pa med do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi
384a7('bum): la yongs su spyod pa med do/ / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su spyod pa med do// byams pa chen po la yongs su spyod pa med do// snying rje chen po la yongs su spyod pa med do//
384b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa
384b2('bum): med do/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa med do// dgra bcom pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// rang byang chub la yongs su spyod pa med do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la
384b3('bum): yongs su spyod pa med do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod
384b4('bum): pa med do/ / rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sprul
384b5('bum): pas lam bsgom pa la brten kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med par yang mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na'ang mi gda' na/ lam bsgom du ci mchis
384b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par
384b7('bum): byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
385a1('bum): gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gda' bar 'gyur
385a2('bum): ba'i dngos po de lta bu'ang ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi tshul rab tu rtog
385a3('bum): bapa yin no/ / gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ 'du shes thams cad sprul pa lta
385a4('bum): bu lags sam/ 'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs
385a5('bum): thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ / tshor ba thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// 'du shes thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// 'du byed thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// rnam par shes pa thams
385a6('bum): cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shes thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ 'du byed
385a7('bum): thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa ni gzugs ma mchis/ tshor ba ma mchis/ 'du shes ma mchis/ 'du
385b1('bum): byed ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis/ gang las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/ ji
385b2('bum): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
385b3('bum): po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ ga shi na rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha 'am/ mi dag las yongs su grol bar
385b4('bum): bya ba'i sems can gang yang dmigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang
385b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ni chos thams cad sgyu ma
385b6('bum): lta bur shes so/ / mthong ngo // rtogs so// sprul pa lta bur shes so// mthong ngo // rtogs so// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems
385b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste rtogs la/ sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste rtogs pa lags na/ gang gi don du byang chub sems
386a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/ bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa lags/ tshad med pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
386a2('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ mngon par shes pa lnga la spyod pa lags/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa lags//
386a3('bum): rnam par thar pa brgya la spyod pa lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
386a4('bum): la spyod pa lags/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyod pa lags/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa lags/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la
386a5('bum): spyod pa lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ byams pa chen po la spyod pa lags/ snying rje chen po la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod
386a6('bum): pa lags/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams
386a7('bum): yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur shes su zin na ni/ byang chub
386b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod de/ rab 'byor sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams
386b2('bum): cad sprul pa lta bur mi shes pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do// sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed
386b3('bum): do/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ mig
386b4('bum): yor lta bu/ sgyu ma lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing //
386b5('bum): sems can rnams gyen du spyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can rnams ni ming dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas
386b6('bum): pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / de dag ming dang mtshan ma las gyen du spyod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ming ni gang lag/
386b7('bum): mtshan ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur gyi ming gi spro btags pa'o// 'di lta ste/
387a1('bum): ming zhes bya ba 'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs shes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes shes bya ba 'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par
387a2('bum): shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bud med ces bya ba 'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ khye'u zhes bya ba 'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas shes
387a3('bum): bya ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ mi zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya ba'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba'am/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i
387a4('bum): 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba 'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ yang
387a5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni sgyu ma'i ming gis sgro btags pa ste/ rab 'byor ming ni thams cad ming gi don gyis btags pa ste/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par
387a6('bum): gyur pa'i 'dus byas thams cad ni ming tsam ste/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ming thams cad ni
387a7('bum): yongs su rtogs pa las byung ba yin gyis/ yongs su brtag pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas pa rnams ni mngon
387b1('bum): par zhen par mi byed do zhes skul ba byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams
387b2('bum): la chos ston pa yin no/ / rab 'byor mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gnyis po 'di dag ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
387b3('bum): gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags pa 'am/ phra
387b4('bum): ba'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring ba'am/ thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtog pas bzung ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
387b5('bum): gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i chos gang yang rung ste/ mtshan mar bzung bas yongs su brtags shing / nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur pa ste/ 'di ni gzugs med
387b6('bum): pa'i mtshan ma zhes bya'o/ / de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing / mtshan
387b7('bum): ma med pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/ ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o// 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'o// zhes bya ba gnyis su mi ltung ba de ltar dgod cing gzhog ste/ rab 'byor de
388a1('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol
388a2('bum): ning mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag thams cad ni ming dang mtshan ma tsam du bas te/ ming dang mtshan
388a3('bum): mar bas la/ btags pa tsam du bas te/ yongs su brtags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
388a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs
388a5('bum): par bgyid pa lags/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te dngos po 'am/ dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na
388a6('bum): ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ khyad par thob par yang mi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par thob pa la sbyor bar mi 'gyur
388a7('bum): gyis rnga 'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma'ang med/ dngos po'ang med pas na/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan
388b1('bum): ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med
388b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
388b3('bum): gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa bzhi yong
388b4('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
388b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs
388b6('bum): par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis
388b7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis
389a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid
389a2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
389a3('bum): domatshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med
389a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
389a5('bum): gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rang
389a6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
389a7('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su
389b1('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
389b2('bum): domatshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
389b3('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs
389b4('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
389b5('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzubs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma
389b6('bum): med pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis
389b7('bum): byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco/
390a1('bum): brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/ rab
390a2('bum): 'byor gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gzhag pa tsam gyi khyon gcig gi mtshan ma yod na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad
390a3('bum): mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par mi
390a4('bum): 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa/ yid la bya ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
390a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma
390a6('bum): mchis shing / dran pa ma mchis te/ yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos
390a7('bum): so/ 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni
390b1('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/ / 'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni
390b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i chos so/ / 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
390b3('bum): mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
390b4('bum): mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang
390b5('bum): gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'i
390b6('bum): 'bras bu'o/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub bo// byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// sangs rgyas kyi
390b7('bum): chos so/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar chos
391a1('bum): thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos
391a2('bum): mang pos rnam par 'phel te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
391a3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don
391a4('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
391a5('bum): dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
391a6('bum): dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub
391a7('bum): kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
391b1('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma
391b2('bum): par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
391b3('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo//
391b4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do//
391b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mtshan ma dang
391b6('bum): bral ba ni mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o/ / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems
391b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams bcom brgyad la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byang ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis
392a1('bum): la slob pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ brtson
392a2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid
392a3('bum): la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
392a4('bum): la slob pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa
392a5('bum): yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa sto
392a6('bum): pa nyid la slob pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin//
392a7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/ stobs lnga la slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa
392b1('bum): ben/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rnam
392b2('bum): par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la slob pa
392b3('bum): yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la slob pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ mi
392b4('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
392b5('bum): brgyad la slob pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin// rab
392b6('bum): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nye bar len pa'i phung po
392b7('bum): lnga la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
393a1('bum): rab tu shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin pa rab tu shes so// de la ji ltar na gzugs
393a2('bum): shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na dbu ba'i phung po snying po med pa ltar/ shin tu gsong ldong dang / shin tu bas tshags dang / shin tu snying po med par rab tu shes te/ de ltar na gzugs
393a3('bum): shes pa yin no/ / ji ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi
393a4('bum): 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin/
393a5('bum): zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci
393a6('bum): log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
393a7('bum): dper na chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba ni gang nas
393b1('bum): kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang dubang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor
393b2('bum): ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ / ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs
393b3('bum): pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na tshor ba'i
393b4('bum): de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no/ / ji ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na smig rgyu la chu shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no// ji
393b5('bum): ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang
393b6('bum): nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes kyi de
393b7('bum): bzhin nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing /
394a1('bum): de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
394a2('bum): dper na chu shing shun pa so sor phye na snying po shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed
394a3('bum): ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed
394a4('bum): kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no/ / ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma
394a5('bum): yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin/
394a6('bum): nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa
394a7('bum): shes pa yin no/ / ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong
394b1('bum): gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
394b2('bum): nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel
394b3('bum): ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na skye mched
394b4('bum): rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong / phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/ de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no//
394b5('bum): ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ mig gi khams kyang mig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mig
394b6('bum): gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / / rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sgra'i khams kyang sgra'i
394b7('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo /
395a1('bum): dri'i khams kyang dri'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i khams kyang lce'i
395a2('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / / ro'i khams kyang ro'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi
395a3('bum): khams kyang lus kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / / reg gi khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
395a4('bum): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / / yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
395a5('bum): kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes te/ de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/
395a6('bum): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin du rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / don gcig pa ma
395a7('bum): yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin
395b1('bum): no/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug pasngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro
395b2('bum): ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa yin/ bden pa shes pa yin/ 'bags
395b3('bum): pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ gnyis su med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no// de bzhin du kun
395b4('bum): 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na sdug bsngal
395b5('bum): kyigyide bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin/ de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu
395b6('bum): shes pa yin/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni shes pa yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
395b7('bum): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phan tshun tha dad ba'i chos de dag
396a1('bum): de ltar 'tshal na/ des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrug par mi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyi
396a2('bum): dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni/ rnam par dkrug par yang 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so// gal
396a3('bum): te dmigs na ni chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam
396a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so/ / de ltar mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no/
396a5('bum): zhes bya bar btags pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o//
396a6('bum): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas/ gang la bslab par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
396a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
396b1('bum): rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/ bcom ldan 'das
396b2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/ dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin
396b3('bum): du gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang /
396b4('bum): zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams
396b5('bum): cad chos kyi dbyings te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings la slob pas chos thams cad la bslabs
396b6('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
396b7('bum): spyod pas/ ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/
397a1('bum): gyur rnam par shes pas bslal par / de skad khams dang / rgyam ched rnams dang / na ci 'brel par 'byung ba la bzab par bsti/ jis kyi
397a2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar brtson
397a3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
397a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi
397a5('bum): ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong
397a6('bum): pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dor ba med
397a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong
397b1('bum): pa nyid la bslab par bgyi ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
397b2('bum): bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dran pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar yang dag par spong
397b3('bum): pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi/
397b4('bum): ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab
397b5('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la
